trailingComments.value: resets state, and removes the caputured
regl context from the axis context

leadingComments.value: resets state, and removes the caputured
regl context from the axis context

trailingComments.value: frame loop logic that captures the regl context
and stores it on the axis context. It also
clears the drawing canvas, resets the axis context,
and calls all queued frame refresh functions

leadingComments.value: frame loop logic that captures the regl context
and stores it on the axis context. It also
clears the drawing canvas, resets the axis context,
and calls all queued frame refresh functions
